Label: THEMIS-B (P1/ARTEMIS-P1): Electrostatic Analyzer (ESA): Electron/Ion Ground-Calculated Energy Fluxes (ions: 5 eV to 25 keV) electrons: 6 eV to 30 keV) and Moments (density, velocity, pressure, and temperature). Includes FULL, REDUCED and BURST modes. FULL: high angular resolution, low (few min) time resolution. REDUCED: degraded angular resolution, high (approx. 3 sec) time resolution. BURST: high angular resolution, high time resolution; only short bursts of data. Note that angular resolution affects moments since they are obtained integrating over the mode-specific angular distribution. - V. Angelopoulos, C.W. Carlson & J. McFadden (UCB, NASA NAS5-02099)
PiName: V. Angelopoulos, C.W. Carlson & J. McFadden

DatasetLink.Title: Instrument description including data modes, products and caveats
Processing history and the THEMIS mission website including TDAS s/w

VariableDescription.Name: thb_peif_data_quality
VariableDescription.LongDescription: ESA Full Mode Ion Moment Data Quality (0: Good data, non-zero: Data may not be suitable, see: http://themis.ssl.berkeley.edu/esa_flag.shtml.)

VariableDescription.Header:
#  WARNING: No Data Selected for this Time Period.

#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******

#     PROJECT                         THEMIS

#     TEXT                             Fluxes (ions: 5 eV to 25 keV) electrons: 6 eV to 30 keV) and Moments (density,                        
#     TEXT                             velocity, pressure, and temperature). Includes FULL, REDUCED and BURST modes.                         
#     TEXT                             FULL: high angular resolution, low (few min) time resolution. REDUCED: degraded                       
#     TEXT                             angular resolution, high (approx. 3 sec) time resolution. BURST: high angular                         
#     TEXT                             resolution, high time resolution; only short bursts of data. Note that angular                        
#     TEXT                             resolution affects moments since they are obtained integrating over the mode-specific                 
#     TEXT                             angular distribution. Moment Data Quality flags (0: good data; non-zero flags                         
#     TEXT                             are totals of values; 1: missing S/C potential, 2: Counter saturation, 4: Solar                       
#     TEXT                             Wind not in Solar Wind Mode, or Solar Wind Mode, not in Solar Wind, 8: (Reduced                       
#     TEXT                             Mode only) slow survey mode+flows, 16: electron density Gt 2*ion density, 32:                         
#                                      ion density Gt 2*electron density, 64: Spacecraft Maneuver).                                          
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Particles (space)
#                                     Plasma and Solar Wind

#                                     ARTEMIS

#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION       (density, velocity, pressure, and temperature). Includes FULL, REDUCED and                            
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION       BURST modes. FULL: high angular resolution, low (few min) time resolution.                            
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION       REDUCED: degraded angular resolution, high (approx. 3 sec) time resolution.                           
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION       BURST: high angular resolution, high time resolution; only short bursts of
